text: Tumhi (allahacya) paigambaracya bolivanyasa ase sarvasadharana bolivane samaju naka jase apasata ekamekance asate. Tumacyapaiki allaha tyanna cangalya prakare janato je najara taluna gupacupa nighuna jatata. (Aika) je loka paigambaracya adesaca virodha karatata tyanni bhaya balaguna rahave ki kadacita tyancyavara ekhada phara motha upadrava (phitana) ye'una na kosalava kinva tyacyavara ekhada duhkhaca aghata na vhava
